ygData.messageBody:
> Btw, odd thing about bards and Unrest and bronze armor. Both
> my cleric friends are selling all the bronze they're finding
> instead of wearing it. They say that with me around, they
> almost never get attacked, and thus feel they don't need the
> extra AC given the weight penalty.

I wouldn't call it an odd thing my friend. In my normal adventuring group
I am as close as to a tank as we have most nights (1 bard, 2 wiz, 1 necro
and 2 clerics). When we are in this configuration the other almost never
get attacked at all, well except for the wizard =). Other than it is
mostly safe, but in lesser party and some other locations they will need
it. Perhaps I will convince them next time I am on. Nothing was more
disheartening to me than seeing DVinn go kill crazy on my poor cleric
friend when she tried to heal me.

Treilanin
